Author: scarletfawn
Text: It's your hormonal balance that's all messed up, nothing to do with BMI. I lose my periods pretty much right away when I start restricting

Author: throwaway71871127198
Text: Iâ€™m not an expert but three months seems like a point where it might be worth talking to your doctor about. Missed/late/irregular periods can be totally normal but that seems like quite a long time to go without one and not know the reason why
